verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: stopped] [ARG1: kicking the can down the road on North Korea] and addressed the nuclear threat . He must do the same with Iran .
[ARG0: Trump] stopped [V: kicking] [ARG1: the can] [ARG2: down the road] [C-ARG1: on North Korea] and addressed the nuclear threat . He must do the same with Iran .
[ARG0: Trump] stopped kicking the can down the road on North Korea and [V: addressed] [ARG1: the nuclear threat] . He must do the same with Iran .
Trump stopped kicking the can down the road on North Korea and addressed the nuclear threat . He [V: must] do the same with Iran .
Trump stopped kicking the can down the road on North Korea and addressed the nuclear threat . [ARG0: He] [ARGM-MOD: must] [V: do] [ARG1: the same] [ARG2: with Iran] .
